job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the process of enhancing an existing AI system, which can involve fine-tuning or other model improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI outputs is a crucial step in the model training and fine-tuning process, directly contributing to model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'AI model fine-tuning', which is a core activity within the modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing are fundamental software development activities, especially when exploring new tools and methodologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities into a customer support system is a software development task that involves building and deploying functional applications.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes improving AI systems and participating in AI model fine-tuning, which aligns with the 'Modeling' task category crucial for GenAI Engineers. The mention of integrating AI capabilities into customer support and prototyping new AI tools also strongly suggests a focus on building and deploying AI-driven applications.
